short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Levvy's password manager keeps your credentials safe and secure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the logins you need to complete a task in Levvy. Increase your productivity by automatically filling in credentials when you launch the sign in page.
